item.title: Chennai Online News Service
item.description: Chennai Online News Service - View News

I am Shivanand. Hacker(not security, but the programming kind).Avid Photographer. Aspiring pianist. Moderate tennis player.

At work, I am privileged to work with awesome teams. I help build infrastructure, compilers, tools, SDKs and applications for an operating system that runs on carrier-class routers. If you are interested in my work, and want to know more, have a look at my resume.
